name: $attachCanvas
description: Attaches the canvas.

args.name: filename
args.description: The name with the extension of the image to be attached as.

name: $canvasBuffer
description: Returns buffer of a canvas.

name: $canvasDataUrl
description: Returns buffer of a canvas.

name: $canvasSize
description: Returns canvas size.

name: $createCanvas
description: Creates a new canvas.

name: $deleteCanvas
description: Deletes the canvas.

name: $resizeCanvas
description: Resizes a canvas.

name: $saveCanvas
description: Saves a canvas to a file.

args.name: path
args.description: Path to a directory. (including the canvas file name and extension)

name: $trimCanvas
description: Trims a canvas.

name: $drawImage
description: Draws an image on a canvas.

name: $drawRect
description: Draws a rectangle on a canvas.

name: $drawText
description: Draws a filled/stroked text on a canvas.

args.name: multiline
args.description: Indicates if the text should be drawn in multiple lines if it exceeds the maximum width.

name: $putPixels
description: Places pixels in the canvas.

args.name: x
args.description: The X coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

args.name: y
args.description: The Y coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

args.name: width
args.description: The width of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

args.name: height
args.description: The height of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

name: $addFrame
description: Adds a frame to the GIF.

name: $checkLZWEndCode
description: Configure if LZW encoded blocks must end with a marker end code.

args.name: boolean
args.description: If LZW encoded blocks must end with a marker end code.

name: $attachGIF
description: Attaches the GIF.

args.name: filename
args.description: The name of the GIF to be attached as.

name: $checkFrameConsistency
description: Configure if frames must be within the screen descriptor.

args.name: boolean
args.description: If frames must be within the screen descriptor.

name: $createFrame
description: Creates a new GIF Frame.

args.name: frame
args.description: Name of the new GIF Frame.

name: $decodeOptions
description: Creates new GIF Decode Options.

args.name: name
args.description: Name of the new GIF Decode Options.

name: $deleteDecoder
description: Deletes the Decoder.

name: $deleteEncoder
description: Deletes the Encoder.

name: $deleteFrame
description: Deletes the frame.

name: $frameOption
description: Sets or returns a GIF Frame option.

name: $GIFDecoderOption
description: Sets or returns a GIF Frame option.

name: $GIFDecoderSize
description: Returns the size of the GIF Decoder.

name: $GIFEncoderGlobalPalette
description: Gets the global palette of the GIF Encoder.

name: $GIFEncoderSize
description: Returns the size of the GIF Encoder.

name: $newGIFDecoder
description: Creates a new GIF Decoder.

args.name: gif
args.description: Name of the new GIF Decoder.

name: $newGIFEncoder
description: Creates a new GIF Encoder.

args.name: gif
args.description: Name of the new GIF Encoder.

name: $nextFrameInfo
description: Reads and saves the next frame info (skipping the buffer) of the GIF Decoder into an env.

args.name: name
args.description: The frame name to save the info as.

name: $readNextFrame
description: Reads and saves the next frame (including the buffer) of the GIF Decoder into an env.

args.name: name
args.description: Name of the env to save the frame info.

name: $saveEncoder
description: Saves an Encoder GIF to a file.

args.name: path
args.description: Path to a directory. (including the canvas file name)

name: $setColorOutput
description: Configure the color output for the GIF Decoder.

name: $setEncoderLoops
description: Sets the number of loops for the GIF Encoder.

name: $setMemoryLimit
description: Configure the memory limit for the GIF Decoder.

name: $skipFrameDecoding
description: Configure whether to skip decoding frames.

name: $addColorStop
description: Adds a color stop to the gradient.

name: $newConicGradient
description: Creates a conic gradient.

args.name: start
args.description: The angle at which to begin the gradient, in radians. The angle starts from a line going horizontally right from the center, and proceeds clockwise.

args.name: x
args.description: The X coordinate of the center of the gradient.

args.name: y
args.description: The Y coordinate of the center of the gradient.

name: $newLinearGradient
description: Creates a linear gradient.

args.name: x1
args.description: The X coordinate of the start point.

args.name: y1
args.description: The Y coordinate of the start point.

args.name: x2
args.description: The X coordinate of the end point.

args.name: y2
args.description: The Y coordinate of the end point.

name: $newRadialGradient
description: Creates a radial gradient.

args.name: x1
args.description: The X coordinate of the start circle.

args.name: y1
args.description: The Y coordinate of the start circle.

args.name: r1
args.description: The radius of the start circle.

args.name: x2
args.description: The X coordinate of the end circle.

args.name: y2
args.description: The Y coordinate of the end circle.

args.name: r2
args.description: The radius of the end circle.

name: $barData
description: Adds data for progress bars.

args.name: value
args.description: Value for the data segment (percentage or absolute).

name: $barOptions
description: Sets options for progress bars.

args.name: options
args.description: Options (type:normal/ratio/pie, draw-type:fill/stroke/clear/none, background-style:color/gradient/pattern, background-radius:number, background-padding:number, background-type:fill/stroke/clear/none, radius:number, direction:horizontal/vertical, clip-radius:number, left:number).

name: $drawProgressBar
description: Creates and draws progress bars on a canvas.

name: $bezierCurveTo
description: Draws a cubic Bézier curve in the current path.

args.name: cx1
args.description: The X coordinate of the first control point.

args.name: cy1
args.description: The Y coordinate of the first control point.

args.name: cx2
args.description: The X coordinate of the second control point.

args.name: cy2
args.description: The Y coordinate of the second control point.

args.name: x
args.description: The X coordinate of the end point.

args.name: y
args.description: The Y coordinate of the end point.

name: $lineDash
description: Sets or returns the line dash segments in a canvas.

name: $lineDashOffset
description: Sets or returns the line dash offset in a canvas.

name: $lineJoin
description: Sets or returns the line join shape in a canvas.

name: $lineTo
description: Draws a straight line in the current path.

args.name: x
args.description: The X coordinate of the line's end point.

args.name: y
args.description: The Y coordinate of the line's end point.

name: $lineWidth
description: Sets or returns the line width in a canvas.

name: $quadraticCurveTo
description: Draws a quadratic Bézier curve in the current path.

args.name: cx
args.description: The X coordinate of the control point.

args.name: cy
args.description: The Y coordinate of the control point.

args.name: x
args.description: The X coordinate of the end point.

args.name: y
args.description: The Y coordinate of the end point.

name: $colorMapRgb
description: Returns the RGB color map calculated from the sample.

name: $colorMapRgba
description: Returns the RGBA color map calculated from the sample.

name: $newNeuQuant
description: Creates a new NeuQuant instance.

args.name: name
args.description: Name of the new NeuQuant instance.

name: $NQindexOf
description: Finds the best-matching index in the color map.

name: $NQlookup
description: Lookup pixel values for color at idx in the colormap.

args.name: idx
args.description: The index of the color in the colormap.

name: $NQmapPixel
description: Maps the rgba-pixel in-place to the best-matching color in the color map.

name: $arc
description: Draws a circular arc in the current path.

args.name: x
args.description: The X coordinate of the arc's center.

args.name: y
args.description: The Y coordinate of the arc's center.

args.name: radius
args.description: The arc's radius. Must be positive.

args.name: startAngle
args.description: The angle at which the arc starts in radians.

args.name: endAngle
args.description: The angle at which the arc ends in radians.

args.name: counterclockwise
args.description: An optional boolean value. If true, draws the arc counter-clockwise between the start and end angles.

name: $arcTo
description: Adds a circular arc in the current path.

args.name: x1
args.description: The X coordinate of the arc's start point.

args.name: y1
args.description: The Y coordinate of the arc's start point.

args.name: x2
args.description: The X coordinate of the arc's end point.

args.name: y2
args.description: The Y coordinate of the arc's end point.

args.name: radius
args.description: The arc's radius. Must be non-negative.

name: $beginPath
description: Begins a new path.

name: $clip
description: Turns the current path into the current clipping region.

name: $closePath
description: Adds a straight line from the current point to the start of the current path.

name: $ellipse
description: Draws a eliiptical arc in the current path.

args.name: x
args.description: The X coordinate of the ellipse's center.

args.name: y
args.description: The Y coordinate of the ellipse's center.

args.name: radiusX
args.description: The ellipse's major-axis radius. Must be positive.

args.name: radiusY
args.description: The ellipse's minor-axis radius. Must be positive.

args.name: rotation
args.description: The rotation of the ellipse, expressed in radians.

args.name: startAngle
args.description: The eccentric angle at which the ellipse starts.

args.name: endAngle
args.description: The eccentric angle at which the ellipse ends.

args.name: counterclockwise
args.description: An optional boolean value. If true, draws the ellipse counter-clockwise between the start and end angles.

name: $fill
description: Fills the current path.

name: $moveTo
description: Begins a new path at the point specified by the given (x, y) coordinates.

args.name: x
args.description: The X coordinate of the point.

args.name: y
args.description: The Y coordinate of the point.

name: $stroke
description: Strokes (outlines) the current path.

name: $getTransform
description: Returns the current transformation matrix.

name: $resetTransform
description: Resets the current transformation.

name: $rotate
description: Rotates a canvas.

name: $scale
description: Adds a scaling transformation to the canvas.

args.name: x
args.description: Scaling factor in the horizontal direction

args.name: y
args.description: Scaling factor in the vertical direction

name: $setTransform
description: Sets the current transformation.

args.name: a
args.description: The cell in the first row and first column of the matrix.

args.name: b
args.description: The cell in the second row and first column of the matrix.

args.name: c
args.description: The cell in the first row and second column of the matrix.

args.name: d
args.description: The cell in the second row and second column of the matrix.

args.name: e
args.description: The cell in the first row and third column of the matrix.

args.name: f
args.description: The cell in the second row and third column of the matrix.

name: $transform
description: Multiplies the current transformation.

args.name: a
args.description: The cell in the first row and first column of the matrix.

args.name: b
args.description: The cell in the second row and first column of the matrix.

args.name: c
args.description: The cell in the first row and second column of the matrix.

args.name: d
args.description: The cell in the second row and second column of the matrix.

args.name: e
args.description: The cell in the first row and third column of the matrix.

args.name: f
args.description: The cell in the second row and third column of the matrix.

name: $translate
description: Adds a translation transformation.

args.name: x
args.description: Distance to move in the horizontal direction.

args.name: y
args.description: Distance to move in the vertical direction.

name: $attachImage
description: Attaches the image.

args.name: filename
args.description: The name with the extension of the image to be attached as.

name: $canvasVersion
description: Returns the forge.canvas version.

name: $compositeOperation
description: Sets or returns the compositing operation in a canvas.

name: $deleteImage
description: Deletes the image.

name: $filter
description: Use filters in your canvas.

name: $fontFamilies
description: Returns a list of the available fonts.

name: $fontVariantCaps
description: Sets or returns the capitalization of the text.

name: $getPixels
description: Returns an array of pixels. (their colors)

args.name: x
args.description: The X coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

args.name: y
args.description: The Y coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

args.name: width
args.description: The width of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

args.name: height
args.description: The height of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

name: $hexToRgb
description: Converts HEX into RGB.

args.name: hex
args.description: The hex to convert into RGB.

name: $hexToRgba
description: Converts HEX into RGBA.

args.name: hex
args.description: The hex to convert into RGBA.

name: $imageBuffer
description: Returns image's buffer.

name: $imageSize
description: Returns image's size.

name: $imageSmoothing
description: Sets or returns the image smoothing in a canvas.

args.name: enabled
args.description: Determines whether scaled images are smoothed or not.

name: $indexedToHex
description: Converts indexed pixels to HEX

args.name: palette
args.description: The palette to use for the conversion.

args.name: transparent
args.description: The index of the transparent color in the palette.

args.name: alwaysAlpha
args.description: Determines whether to always include the alpha channel in the output. (default: false)

args.name: allowShort
args.description: Whether to allow short hex output. (default: false)

args.name: pixels
args.description: The pixels to convert into HEX.

name: $indexedToRgba
description: Converts indexed pixels to RGBA

args.name: palette
args.description: The palette to use for the conversion.

args.name: transparent
args.description: The index of the transparent color in the palette.

args.name: pixels
args.description: The pixels to convert into RGBA.

name: $letterSpacing
description: Sets or returns the spacing between letters when drawing text.

name: $loadImage
description: Loads an image.

name: $measureText
description: Measures text.

name: $opacity
description: Sets or returns the opacity in a canvas.

name: $rectAlign
description: Sets or returns the rect/image align.

name: $rectBaseline
description: Sets or returns the rect/image baseline.

name: $registerFont
description: Registers a font.

name: $restore
description: Restores the most recently saved canvas state.

name: $rgbaToHex
description: Converts RGBA into HEX.

args.name: alwaysIncludeAlpha
args.description: Whether to always include the alpha channel in the output. (default: false)

args.name: allowShort
args.description: Whether to allow short hex output. (default: false)

args.name: rgba
args.description: The RGBA to convert into HEX.

name: $rgbToHex
description: Converts RGB into HEX.

args.name: allowShort
args.description: Whether to allow short hex output. (default: false)

args.name: rgba
args.description: The RGB to convert into HEX.

name: $save
description: Saves the entire state of the canvas.

name: $shadowOptions
description: Sets or returns the shadow options in a canvas.

name: $textAlign
description: Sets or returns the text align.

name: $textBaseline
description: Sets or returns the text baseline.

name: $wordSpacing
description: Sets or returns the spacing between words when drawing text.
